divs: sighting detailsi was driving from ithaca ny to go (7-8mil drive) to trumansburg ny(countryside) where we were residing at that time.it was between 17:10pm and 17:20pm max. i know that because my father was getting out of work at 17:00pm and we were going home together. the sun was close to setting and it was reflecting back a bit. as i was driving out of the city something caught my eye as it was reflecting in the sun (left side of driver). i have seen this round disc shaped silver\platinum object flying left side of my car. i was probably going about 50mil a hour. the object was very low to the ground probably about 100m at the most or lower then that pretty dissent size about at least 2 times as a mazda mx6 in length . it moved from the side of my car(left) to almost over me. it was heavy traffic and lots of people have seen it. as it went over the car i pointed out to my father the object and he seen it too.. this silver\platinum disc had small lights surrounding the disc, running around it in a circular motion one by one. on top of the disc there was a half circle transparent in color\glass or something and there were 3 big lights spinning in it. underneath the disc in the center there was an inward circle like a submarine door, and the outside circle was surrounded with lights running in a circular motion they were white light. after it has passed over my car it started to speed up going to the left over some trees and with in 2 seconds was gone in to the sunset. i have never seen a ufo in my life neither has my father seen one till that day. we were very excited of what we have seen! we told our family about it too they were suspicious about things of that nature. that same night i have seen it again! i was doing some homework and i was up late close to 12am. my bedroom was upstairs and my window was facing east. that night was a clear night except a white lost cloud in the sky in front of my window, as i turned off the light to get in bed, i looked out the window because my bed was right next to it and i have seen the cloud flashing in colors, yellow, red, and green (jumping light) through the cloud as they were spinning at fast rate. colors i have never seen in my life! they were so intense the closest thing i could describe to you it would have to be a rainbow. it was the same disc going towards cayuga lake direction. i went out of the house to see if i can see it again. in few minutes i have seen it again coming from the same direction as the first time going towards the lake again. it was flying at extreme speeds, i never seen anything fly that fast i know it was something the air force doesn���t have. it was flying very fast and it made a 90 degree turn without even slowing down and disappeared. it was gone in less then 5 second out of the night sky and that was the last time i have seen it. i told some of my friends about it and they have seen similar things at different times in other close areas (dryden ny). upstate ny lots of people encountered flying discs has something to do with the cayuga lake. 2 years later after the first incident, i was in the same room sleeping (my bed was close to the wall and window).i woke up to a humming sound, the closest i can describe it, would have to be some kind of ventilator or vacuum. i was very tired that night and i thought that the noise it will go away whatever it is, it might be on the street (trumansburg rd). that noise it was going on for some time through out the night probably at least 30 min or so. i was waken up, i was going in and out of my sleep. as i mentioned my room was on the second floor, and my window was facing e. the only light that could have enter my room was the sun. as i was sleeping i was facing the wall and a bright light illuminated my room just like you have brought the sun in my room. it was night time no day ! i jumped up and turned around to see what it was but i haven���t seen anything. the noise was gone and also the light that entered my room. next day i went in the city, it was about 15:00pm. it was a cloudy afternoon but through the clouds something caught my eyes, i could see jumping lights of different colors again, going e very fast and was gone in 2 sec.this incident was at about the same location as 2 years earlier. that was the last time i have seen anything. i thought i share it with you guys. thanks for taking the time to read.
